/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. From the vantage point of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, the city unfolds in a panorama of urban life. The street, lined with a variety of buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding movement and dynamism to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
